name: Treatment and Pharmacy Library
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" x 2 #L "Pharma Tech Tutoring Device" "55682" #L "Portable Surgery Clinic" "43551" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Pharma Tech Tutoring Device = #L "Hacked Pharma Tech Tutoring Device" "161768" Skills: | BE,CL | ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Portable Surgery Clinic = #L "Hacked Portable Surgery Clinic" "161765" Skills: | BE,CL | ------------------------------ Hacked Portable Surgery Clinic + Hacked Pharma Tech Tutoring Device = #L "Treatment and Pharmacy Library" "161772" Skills: | EE,CL | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Same as the Treatement Librairy except that it give Pharma Tech bonus and can only be equipped by Doctors. Don't forget that the Hacker tools are used in the process...
